description: ORDER directing the clerk to amend the docket sheet to reflect Ray Hobbs as Director of the Arkansas Department of Correction; after conducting an evidentiary hearing on Sasser's mental retardation claim, finding that he is not mentally retarded  as that condition is defined in Atkins v. Virginia, 536 U.S. 304 (2002) and that Sasser's Amended Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus, ECF No. 48, should be, and hereby is, DENIED. ***Civil Case Terminated.  Signed by Honorable Jimm Larry Hendren on November 3, 2010. (cap)
